recommendations: Youness Yaghcha “I had the great pleasure to work with Mira during several months on a very big engagement. She is well organized, hard worker and very creative. I was amazed by her capability to take fast decisions under pressure. Working with Mira is awesome because she always add more value than expected and therefore surprise us. One sentence that describes her best: she gets the things done!”

Fatima Mousa “As Mira's ex-manager at Arabnet, I've had the pleasure to train Mira and witness her growth in terms of both knowledge and personality. She is eager to learn and has a special spark that drove me to give her more responsibilities than what her position required. Mira's confidence and openness to feedback made her one of the most reliable and trustworthy members of my team.”

honors_and_awards.title: Exemplary Student Life Experience Award
honors_and_awards.description: This award was presented to me during the University of Balamand's 2018 Award Ceremony. This award reflects the amount of participation put during my college years representing the University at various conferences and competitions.
